scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These three items, 1961 and 1993, contain genealogical information about the descendants of John Stewart (1806-1885)and Mary Amanda (Williamson) Stewart (1822-1910)of "Brook Hill,"Richmond, Virginia. Included are two booklets, "The Brook Hill Calendar" (Christmas 1961) and "The Brook Hill Calendar VII 1988-1993" (Christmas 1993), containing chronologies of the direct descendants of John and Mary Stewart; and, a family tree of the Stewartand Bryanfamilies, from the early 1800s to the 1990s. The cover of the 1961 booklet is made from "Brook Hill" wallpaper.
